roleset.name: make less intense; satisfy
roleset.note: SLAKE-V NOTES: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. Verbnet class subjugate-42.3. (from slake.01-v)

example.name: drink example
example.text: [PRO] Slake your thirst with an inviting glass of Blackberry Iced Tea.
example.arg: with an inviting glass of Blackberry Iced Tea.

example.name: non-drink example
example.text: A kiss from a neighbor girl won't slake your thirst.
example.arg: A kiss from a neighbor girl

roleset.name: cause to heat and crumble by treatment with water
roleset.note: SLAKE-V NOTES: Roleset by Katie based on internet search, parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. (from slake.02-v)

example.name: transative example
example.text: Once slaked [T* 1] with water, [it * 1]could be spread on fields to reduce acidity.
